item.title: Aspose.CAD for .NET 21.12 - Release Notes
item.description: This page contains release notes for Aspose.CAD for .NET 21.12 Key Summary Category CADNET-8467 setDrawColor Still not working Enhancement CADNET-8444 Read name CadInsertObject corresponding to AutoCAD notation Enhancement CADNET-8382 The result EMF image looks as empty. Enhancement CADNET-8377 FBX failed to export to WEBP, DICOM, EMF and hang on export to BMP Enhancement CADNET-8354 Implement merging of MText and Xrrecord’s texts and review test results Enhancement CADNET-8344 Dashed line exported wrong as continuous in rotated images Enhancement CADNET-8356 DWG image is not rendering all elements in PDF conversion Enhancement CADNET-8351 “Image loading failed: Index was outside the bounds of the array.

item.title: Aspose.CAD for .NET 21.1 - Release Notes
